column5: Card Description
Places a doll into position and makes it attack. The position depends on the button used\, so it\'s a basic skill that ties the opponent down with mines.
Throws enchanted dolls then backs away. The dolls explode upon being attacked. At higher levels\, the dolls can also be detonated after a time delay.
Places several dolls above in waiting\, then makes them attack successively.
Leaves C dolls idle for later activation. If you place a lot\, you can set up a high-powered wide range attack.
Fires so that the thrown doll comes back like a boomerang. A direct attack that has speed and power\, a rare thing for Alice.
Throws magically-charged dolls. The projectiles are slow enough for Alice to attack simultaneously.
A close-range attack that gathers dolls with weapons and has them jab forward repeatedly. It uses dolls\, but it\'s a melee attack and so cannot be grazed.
B button places a doll around you in orbit. C button expends a doll to attack. At most\, 3 dolls can be in orbit\, when that happens\, B button releases all 3 dolls to attack.

A technique that allows dolls to hide. The dolls will lie in wait as long as the button is held\, and attack on release. The dolls can be attacked by the enemy even if they can\'t see them\, so be careful.
Throws self-propelled doll grenades. The dolls walk slowly and explode on contact. There can only be one of these on the screen at a time.
A ranged attack that utilizes doll archers who will attack from behind the player. The trajectories of the arrows are scattered\, but the arrows themselves are dense and cover a wide area.
Launches a reflecting beam from idle C dolls. The beam passes through all dolls and finally goes flying toward the opponent.
Throws a magically-charged doll that explodes. Since it\'s slow\, it\'s hard to land a direct hit\, but the power is high for the cost.
Assemble the dolls into formation and attack. The formation spread out with time. Though the power is quite limited\, it is useful in restricting the opponent\'s movements.
Shoots a high-output laser from the doll. The delay is short and the range is infinite\, so it can be used as a normal shot easily.
Throws a doll capable of powerful explosions. Explosion size\, power\, and speed are increased.
Creates a dense formation of dolls. If the opponent is trapped inside\, they\'ll be stuck and will take great damage.
Shoot lasers from multiple dolls. Covers a wide area in front with high power.
Throws a great number of dolls into the air\, which create a net of lasers below them. Its power is directional\, so it\'s tricky\, but it\'s a great way of smoking out the enemy.
Releases a doll that fires a cross- shaped laser. You can generally move right after throwing it\, so you can use the laser as a shield to influence the battle to your advantage.
Lets you precisely manipulate a single doll. Control it with the arrow keys and attack buttons. You can interrupt control with the D Button.
Fires a beam between you and a doll set with C. If you control their positions carefully\, this can be an extremely useful attack that hits right where you want it to.
Many dolls attack the enemy at close range. Excellent speed and coverage\, with pretty good range to boot. A spellcard that was developed as a last resort.
Explosive-laden dolls march on the ground\, resulting in a large-scale\, long-lasting suppression attack. Destructive power is extremely high\, and can potentially mow down the enemy.
